overview: Sterling Pictures is proud to present a tender story of Love, Hope...and Wet T-shirts! This is one contest with a difference, as seven dripping chicks battle it out for the title. They'll do anything to persuade the judges: In fact, there's nothing that's beyond their reach. So if you're sitting at the bar bored, join Nici and her pals! You're in for a treat.
title: Devil in a Wet T-Shirt
